oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Special Order No. 206 assigning sergeant to Louisiana Volunteers of African Descent
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Document dated July 30th, 1863, assigning Sgt. Zina B. Chatfield as Orderly Sgt., 12th La. Inf. Regt., Vols. of African Descent. Signed by T. S. Binert, Assistant Adjutant General, by order of Maj. Gen. Ulysses S. Grant. Chatfield had been earlier assigned to Co. A, 4th Minn. Inf. Regt. Zina Bradley Chatfield (1828-1923).
